item.title: Version 4.7.0
item.description:
FocusMode 4.7.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Always On Screen Button: Makes it even easier to get into focus mode
  • Quick Task View: Add workspaces from quick task view and improved UI and UX for better usability
  • Menu Bar Mode: Refactored compact mode to menu bar mode

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed notification perferences being disabled
  • Notifications not showing on task completion
  • Fixed auto overtime ending at 1 second in overtime
  • Fixed status bar icon not working when compact mode(now menu bar mode) is on
  • Fixed workspace not resetting when changing from task-with-workspace to task-without-workspace
  • Fixed blinking issue when starting task from anywhere except main start button
  • Performance improvements when timer is running
  • Other minor bug and optimization fixes
